titleStmt.title: A brief narrative of the case between His Royal Highness James duke of York, lord of the mannor of Richmond ali√†s West-sheen, in the county of Surry; George Carew esq; one of the customary tenants of the said manor, and Sir James Butler, mortgagee upon a conditional surrender, and others concerned in the said case.
titleStmt.author: Brown, John, gent.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Signed and dated at end: Recollected by John Brown, gent. April 20. 1682.
